bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with ding chuang 丁瘡 , pin sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 齊州榮姥丸，凡 是丁腫皆用治之方 , “The pills of grandma Rong from Qizhou: a recipe to treat all cases of pin swelling ”.

b) Of pin sores with an obviously inflamed swelling and a root that cannot be felt by touching. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 丁腫候，此由是丁瘡而 帶焮腫，而無根者也 , “Signs of pin swelling : This is an inflamed swelling resulting from pin sores, but without a root”. Ding zhong 疔腫 , pin-illness with swelling [65]

Pathological Condition identical with ding zhong 丁腫 , pin swelling. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry can 蠶 quoting Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry bai jiang can 白僵蠶：封丁腫 , “Cover the pin swelling”, writes: 封疔 腫 , “Cover the pin-illness swelling ”.
